attributes.action: A election to dissolve the government and elect a new party
attributes.additional_details: We want a new government party, not one the have force their way in through a bogus collaboration party. We need a stronger UK party not one that is dictated to by Europe. A new government who is weak to the rich and the foreign help the working class and pensioners the people who are the back bone of the country not the people who blew the country dry.

rejection.details: This petition needs to be clearer what it is askign for.
